solution_line_template: First divide the number of pandas by {pandas_per_couple} to find the number of couples: {num_pandas} pandas / {pandas_per_couple} = <<{num_pandas}/{pandas_per_couple}={num_panda_couples}>>{num_panda_couples} panda couples

Then multiply that number by {pregnant_percent_num}% to find the number of babies: {num_panda_couples} panda couples * {pregnant_percent_num}% = <<{num_panda_couples}*{pregnant_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={num_panda_babies}>>{num_panda_babies} panda babies
